name: Smartarget Follow Us
author: Smartarget

sections.description:
Get more followers on your Social Media profiles
Make it easy for your site visitors to know about your Facebook/Instagram/Twitter/Linkedin/Pinterest/Youtube/TikTok profiles and follow you.
Social Media -Follow Us allows you to tell your user about your social media profiles so they can start following you. Everybody knows about the power of Social Media to bring users back to your store and sell more, it’s time you also increase the amount of followers.
Smartarget Social Media – Follow Us plugin works also with WooCommerce, Elementor and Oxygen Builder.

Smartarget Follow Us Pro Features:

Pro version overcomes your limitations with lite version of Smartarget Follow Us.

Smartarget Follow Us PRO Plugin Features

  • Apps visibility on all pages
  • No Smartarget label

BUY Smartarget Follow Us Pro Features : Buy Now
sections.installation:
1. Unpack plugin zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open plugin settings page
  4. Configure settings and press Save
sections.faq:
Where I can create Smartarget account

You can create account here: Smartarget.online
